function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for better self-sufficiency and diverse economic structures","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on hotel industry in urban areas","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of existing literature review on the impacts of the pandemic on cities","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited literature on cities and pandemics","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of discussion on socio-economic and institutional factors impacting resilience building potentials of smart solutions","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of linkages between smart solutions and multiple resilience abilities","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited examination of whether deployment of smart solutions may detract from resilience abilities","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Teleworking may improve labor productivity through saving travel times","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated automation in industrial activities may lead to job displacement and reduced employment opportunities for manual labor","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of factories impacting long-term sustainability","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-risk face-to-face encounters due to supply chain disruptions","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to data for evidence-based decision making","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly expanding research leading to oversight of relevant literature","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dissemination of results to various stakeholders","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of participants from high-risk regions in the study","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model 1 not adjusted for employment status in models estimating sickness benefit transfers","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of diagnosis related groups charges and outpatient charges for unit cost estimates may not accurately capture the full cost of treatment","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on market price for prescription medicines may not reflect the actual cost incurred by the healthcare system","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible underestimation of prevalence of flourishing declined significantly","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Association between low flourishing and high healthcare
